A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: In spite of stand-out moments and brave story choices\, The Last Jedi is a failed attempt at storytelling. From convenient plotlines\, gaps in logic\, inappropriate humour\, to character arcs set up in previous films that were not followed through\, The Last Jedi seems like a film with a mission to subvert all our expectations and be so unpredictable that the Director forgot the essential ingredients that go into making a movie great - believable characters and strong storylines. I feel that somewhere within Rian Johnson's broad strokes is a genuinely good story waiting to be told\, hence my attempt at a re-write that stays true to the Star Wars mythos while at the same time channelling Rian Johnson's derring-do\, so that we can have at least on paper a film that is a worthy follow-up to The Force Awakens and the Star Wars saga: https://medium.com/@christopherminjoot/save-the-last-jedi-cd59b8939ff1
